Data: Given that I'm in equipment detail screen
Action: When I click to create an observation, I create a new one with draft status, and click "save & exit,"
Expected Result: Then the observation created should be listed on the piece of equipment with Code = N/A.

Data: Given that I created some observations with "draft" status within that same piece of equipment
Action: When I randomly access each observation, and change its status randomly according to the options
Expected Result: Then in the screen of equipment detail, the observations should be in ascending order.

Data: Given that I'm in the detail of an old observation
Action: When I link that same equipment in the "asset" field, and access the piece of equipment
Expected Result: Then the observation should be added to the list and should be sorted according to its "code" numbers.

Data: Given that I'm in the detail of a equipment type
Action: When I click to create an observation, I create a new one with draft status, and click "save & exit,"
Expected Result: Then the observation created should be listed on the piece of equipment with Code = N/A.

Data: Given that I created some observations with the "draft" status within the same equipment type
Action: When I randomly access each observation and change its status randomly according to the options
Expected Result: Then in the equipment type's detail, the observations should be in ascending order.

Data: Given that I am in the detail of an old observation
Action: When I link this same equipment type in the "asset" field and then access the equipment type
Expected Result: Then the observation should be added to the list and should be sorted according to its "code" numbers.

Data: Given that I am in the detail of a system
Action: When I click to create an observation, and create a new one with the draft status, and click "save & exit,"
Expected Result: Then the created observation should be listed in the system with the Code = N/A.

Data: Given that I created some observations with the "draft" status within the same system
Action: When I randomly access each observation and change its status randomly according to the options
Expected Result: Then in the system's detail, the observations should be in ascending order.

Data: Given that I'm in the detail of an old observation
Action: When I link that same system in the "asset" field and then access the system
Expected Result: Then the observation should be added to the list and sorted according to its "code" numbers.

Data: Given that I'm in the detail of a document
Action: When I perform the action of linking an existing observation in the system, and select the observation with the highest "code" from the list, and repeat the process a few times
Expected Result: Then the document's observations list should be listed and sorted in ascending order.

Data: Given that I'm in the detail of a document with some linked observations
Action: When I perform the action of linking existing observations in the system, and link an observation with a "draft" status
Expected Result: Then the document's observations list should be listed and sorted in ascending order except for those with a "N/A" status.

Data: Given that I'm in the detail of a document containing an observation with a "N/A" status
Action: When I access that observation and change its status to any available option, and return to that document
Expected Result: Then that modified observation should be in the list organized in ascending order.

Data: Given that I'm in the SOR subtask list
Action: When I delete a subtask from the list (e.g., SOR-6), and the order changes to 5>7, and I click the "reorder subtask" button
